* The randomly shipped credits sheet, lyric book, mounted photo card, photo card, postcard, sticker do not vary by version.
* The content may slightly vary due to the production process.
[Size]
- 160 x 160 x 60mm/approximately 900 g

productName: LISA FIRST SINGLE ALBUM LALISA
description:
LISA has taken the first step in her solo career.
In just the title, “LALISA,” containing her own real name, fans and music listeners can fully sense her confidence, pride, and love for herself.
LISA personally participated in the design of her first single album, “LALISA,” which includes the packaging, photo book, photo card (1 of 4 shipped at random), instant photo (1 of 4 shipped at random), and more. High in collectible value, this first release limited edition also contains a Rare Golden Ticket (shipped at random) and a Rare Golden Ticket.
[Size]
177 x 257 x 34mm / 800g
[Contents]
Packaging + CD + Photo Book (88 pages) + Lyrics Sheet (1 page) + Photo Card (1 of 4 shipped at random) + Instant Photo (1 of 4 shipped at random) + Double-sided Poster (1 poster / first release limited edition only) + Rare Gold Photo Card (1 of 4 shipped at random / first release limited edition only) + Rare Golden Ticket (1 ticket / only 50 shipped at random) + 4x6 Photo (1 photo / limited to YG SELECT pre-orders)
